property.description: The name of the property that will be checked. Examples are `facing` or `age`. See: [Minecraft Wiki: Block States (List of block states)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state)
property.markdownDescription: The name of the property that will be checked. Examples are `facing` or `age`. See: [Minecraft Wiki: Block States (List of block states)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state)

comparison.description: If specified and if the property uses an integer, determines how the integer value of the specified property should be compared to the specified value. Only used if the specified property has an [integer](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.
comparison.markdownDescription: If specified and if the property uses an integer, determines how the integer value of the specified property should be compared to the specified value. Only used if the specified property has an [integer](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.

compare_to.description: If specified, the itneger at which the integer value of the specified property will be compared to. Only used if the specified property has an [integer](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.
compare_to.markdownDescription: If specified, the itneger at which the integer value of the specified property will be compared to. Only used if the specified property has an [integer](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.

value.description: If specified, the boolean to compare to the boolean value of the specified property. Only used if the specified property has a [boolean](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.
value.markdownDescription: If specified, the boolean to compare to the boolean value of the specified property. Only used if the specified property has a [boolean](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.

enum.description: If specified, the string at which the string value of the specified property will be compared to. Only used if the specified property has a [string](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.
enum.markdownDescription: If specified, the string at which the string value of the specified property will be compared to. Only used if the specified property has a [string](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state) value.

type.description:
## Block State

---


[Block Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/block_condition_types/block_state)

Checks a block state property of the block.

Type ID: `origins:block_state`




---

### üìù Note

If none of the expected fields are specified, this condition will just check if the block has the specified property.



---

### Examples

```json
"block_condition": {
    "type": "origins:and",
    "conditions": [
        {
            "type": "origins:block",
            "block": "minecraft:chest"
        },
        {
            "type": "origins:block_state",
            "property": "facing",
            "enum": "north"
        }
    ]
}
```

This example will check if a Chest block is facing north.

```json
"block_condition": {
	"type": "origins:block_state",
	"property": "age"
}
```

This example will check if the specified block has the `age` Block State property.
